class_description:
You use query items with the queryItems property of an NSURLComponents object.
Important
The Swift overlay to the Foundation framework provides the URLQueryItem structure, which bridges to the NSURLQueryItem class. For more information about value types, see Working with Cocoa Frameworks in Using Swift with Cocoa and Objective-C (Swift 4.1).

Methods.method_description: Initializes a newly allocated query item with the specified name and value.

params.param_description: The name of the query item. For example, in the URL http://www.apple.com/search/?q=iPad, the name parameter is q.
The value for the query item. For example, in the URL http://www.apple.com/search/?q=iPad, the value parameter is iPad.

Vars.var_description: The name of the query item.
The value for the query item.
